Old Hindu Solar dates

Source: R/old_hindu.R
old_hindu_solar_date.Rd

Old Hindu Solar dates

Usage

old_hindu_solar_date(year, month, day)

as_old_hindu_solar(date)

Arguments

year

A numeric vector of years

month

A numeric vector of months

day

A numeric vector of days

date

A date vector on some calendar

Examples

gregorian_date(2025, 1, 1:31) |>
  as_old_hindu_solar()
#> <old_hindu_solar[31]>
#>  [1] 5125-09-18 5125-09-19 5125-09-20 5125-09-21 5125-09-22 5125-09-23
#>  [7] 5125-09-24 5125-09-25 5125-09-26 5125-09-27 5125-09-28 5125-09-29
#> [13] 5125-09-30 5125-09-31 5125-10-01 5125-10-02 5125-10-03 5125-10-04
#> [19] 5125-10-05 5125-10-06 5125-10-07 5125-10-08 5125-10-09 5125-10-10
#> [25] 5125-10-11 5125-10-12 5125-10-13 5125-10-14 5125-10-15 5125-10-16
#> [31] 5125-10-17
